meanings.definition: A loose, flowing garment worn in bed.
meanings.sent1: She put on her soft bedgowns before going to sleep.
meanings.sent2: The cozy bedgowns kept her warm during the chilly night.
meanings.sent3: Her cat always tries to snuggle into her bedgowns when she's reading in bed.
meanings.sent4: The bedgowns wrapped around her like a gentle hug.
meanings.sent5: The floral pattern on her bedgowns reminded her of a peaceful garden.

meanings.definition: A garment worn by women in the 18th century, consisting of a bodice and skirt.
meanings.sent1: The historical reenactor wore a beautiful bedgowns at the event.
meanings.sent2: In the museum, you can see an authentic 18th-century bedgowns on display.
meanings.sent3: She felt like a character from a Jane Austen novel in her bedgowns.
meanings.sent4: The bedgowns made her feel like she had stepped back in time.
meanings.sent5: The delicate lace trim on the bedgowns added an elegant touch to her outfit.
